S.FORM: Initu haw kita, ta! Malingatu tu kita.
Katemireng! Mitaung!
Kapah haw kisu pasevana'ay.
Kamaru'.
Kapah haw kamu alumanay! I nipicudad nu mita anini a remiad, a pasevana' kaku i tamuwan tu ngangan nu kakaenan nu Pangcah.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的阿美語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today, I am going to teach you how to say the Ami language for food.

S.FORM: Mavana' tu haw kisu a mitengil tu suwal nu pasevana'ay?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: Caay kava:na' kaku a mitengil tu suwal nu misu pasevana'ay, kapah tu haw a kinacacay aca a miliyaw a semuwal?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我聽不懂。可以再說一次好嗎?
I don't understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: Caay pakatengil kaku, kapa:h tu haw a satataangen atu:di?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎
I can't hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: Pimelawi itini! Duduen ku nipiasip nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: Hay! Kapah ku niasip nu misu.
Kakinacacay aca a miasip, satataangen atudi.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: Terep han, akaa kasemuwal.
Patahekalen ku cudad.
Hay, pasevana'ay.
Pasadaken ku sapisurit nu misu.
Pasevana'ay! Mapawan kaku a mikerid tu sapisurit nu maku.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Patahkalen ku savuric.
Pasevana'ay, mapawan kaku a mikerid tu savuric.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: Picaliwi tu savuric nu teparay nu misu.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: Pacaliwi kaku tu savuric nu misu.
Maherek tu ku nipicudad nu mita.
Tangasa itini ku nipinanam nu mita, rumaaw tu a lipayan a malalitemuh.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: Cima saw kisu?
Ci Tumay kaku.
Cima saw kisu?
U wawa ni Marang kaku, ci Tumay ku ngangan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: I'm Marang's son, my name is Tumay.

S.FORM: Cima saw kisu?
U micudaday ni Luuh kaku, ci Tumay ku ngangan nu maku,
S.TRANSL: I am a student of Luuh, my name is Tumay.

S.FORM: Maan han saw ku ngangan nu misu?
Ci Tumay han ku ngangan nu maku.
Cima han saw ku ngangan ni ama isu.
Ci Marang han ku ngangan ni ama aku.
Ci Kilang cira.
U vavainayan a kaka nu maku cira, ci Kilang han ku ngangan nira.
S.TRANSL: He's my brother, his name is Kilang.

S.FORM: Cima han saw ku ngangan nira?
Ci Kilang han ku ngangan nira.
Ci Valiyus han haw ku ngangan nira?
Hay! Ci Valiyus han ku ngangan nira.
Ci Valiyus haw ku ngangan nira?
Caay, ci Kilang ku ngangan nira.
Cima saw kira tamdaw?
Ci Panay cira, u vayi nu maku cira.
Cira saw kira tamdaw?
U cavay nu maku cira, Ci Nakaw han ku ngangan nira.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Nakaw。
She's my friend, her name is Nakaw.

S.FORM: Pina tu saw ku mihcaan nu misu?
Muketep tu ku mihcaan nu maku.
Pina tu saw ku mihcaan nira?
Savaw tu tusa ku mihcaan nira.
Pina tu saw ku mihcaan ni ama nu misu?
Lima a pulu' tu ku mihcaan ni ama aku.
Papina saw kamu a malekaka?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Cacay ku kaka tu vavainayan, cacay ku kaka tu vavahian, cacay ku sava tu vavainayan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 我有一位哥哥， 一位姊姊，一位弟弟。
I have a brother, a sister and a younger brother.

S.FORM: Sikaka haw kisu tu vavainayan?
Awaay ku vavainayan a kaka nu maku.
Papina saw ku tamdaw nu luma' namu?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: Sasepat ku tamdaw nu luma' niyam.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: Icuwa saw kisu a micudad?
I Hualien kaku a micudad.
Cima saw cira?
Ci vaki nu maku cira.
U maan saw ku dademaken ni vaki nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: U kincal cira.
Cima saw kira tamdaw?
U vavahian a kaka nu maku cira.
Mikuli haw cira?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: I paisingan cira a mikuli.
U malekakaay haw kina tatusaay?
S.TRANSL: 這兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?
Are these two people brothers and sisters?

S.FORM: Caay, u malecavayay ku heni.
U Pangcah haw kisu?
Hay! U Pangcah kaku.
U Pangcah haw ku vavahi nu misu?
Hay! U Pangcah cira.
Tarakaw haw ci ama nu misu?
Hayi! Tarakaw amin ku luma' niyam.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: Micudad tu haw ku vavahian a sava nu misu?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: Hayi! Micudad tu cira.
Mavana' haw ku sava nu misu a misanuPangcah?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: Hayi! Mavana' ku heni a misanuPangcah.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: Papina saw kamu a malekaka?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Tatulu kami a malekaka.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: Makumud haw ku aru' nu misu atu ina aci ama?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: Hay, makumud ku aru' niyam..
Makumud haw ku aru' nu misu atu vaki aci vayi?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: Caay, caay kakumud ku aru' nu maku atu heni.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: Cima saw ku mikumuday i tisuwan?
Makumud ku aru' nu maku atu ina, ama, kaka tu vavainayan.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: Namakacuwaay saw kisu?
Namaka Hualienay kaku.
Icuwa saw ku luma' namu?
I Hualien ku luma' niyam.
Icuwa saw ku niyaru' nu misu?
I Hualien ku niyaru' nu maku.
Icuwa saw ku niyaru' namu?
I Natauran ku niyaru' niyam.
A hacuwa saw kisu a taluma' i niyaru'?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: I pipantangan nu laludan taluma' tu kaku.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: U wawa nu Pangcah kaku.
Masasaw ku remiad anini?
Cidalantu, caledes ku remiad.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: Sienaw haw i hekal?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: Sienaw, saadihayen tu ku nikasivuduy.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Caledes haw ku hekal?
Caay, sivali tu! saepi' saan.
Masasaw ku remiad anini?
Masitudung ku remiad anini, sademsem saan.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: Mamaan saw ku remiad nina lavii?
Awaay ku kutem, masadak tu ku vuis.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: Masasaw ku remiad nu hekal?
Salaw sahen ku urad, masadak tu ku cidal, tahekal tu ku talakal ni Adek.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: Mamaan saw ku remiad i tamuwan?
Tataang ku vali i tamiyanan.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: Kapah haw ku remiad i tamuwan?
Kapah! Macidaltu itini.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: A tara tu kaku a micudad.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: Sienaw ku remiad, saadihayen tu ku nikasivuduy.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: A tara tu kaku.
A tataang ku urad anusani, keriden tu ku cacevaren.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: A uradan hakiya?
Navetili'an nasani, a uradan tu anusani.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: Uradan tu haw?
Nauradan nasani, masalawtu anini.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: Uradan tu haw?
Mahaen nauradan, mararemed ku lalan kiyami.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: Nauradan haw? Kiya matupic saw ku tiretirengan nu misu.
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: Uradan i hekal, nacaay kasicacevaren kaku.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Masasaw kisu?
Tanuvali saan, adada tuaca ku tangal nu maku.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: Masasaw kisu?
Tataak ku cidal, adada tuaca ku tangal nu maku a mapa'ing'ing.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: Mapawan kaku tu sapisurit.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Pacaliway nu maku kisu.
Mapawan kaku a sialapit.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: Mahaen kaku, ta! Micakay kita.
S.TRANSL: Me too, let's go buy it.

S.FORM: Ta! Micakaya kita tu sapisurit.
S.TRANSL: 走吧! 我們去買筆好嗎?
Let's go! Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: Hayi!, a micakay aca kaku tu savuric.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: Micakaya haw kita tu sakaranam?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: Hamanan! Nakemaentu kaku i luma'.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: Mapawan kaku a pa'ecuy tu tavu nu maku.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Sakalamkamen a pa'ecuy.
Mapawan kaku a sitavu.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Tatuekaw tu nu mita a kemaen tu tavu nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: A u maan saw ku sakalahuk nu misu?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: A u niparasur nu cacudadan a tavu ku sakalahuk nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校準備的午餐。
I want to eat the lunch prepared by the school.

S.FORM: A u maan saw ku sakalahuk nu misu?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Sitavu kaku anini a remiad, matatueka kita a malahuk.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: Milanciw haw kita?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: Hay kati! Taraaw tu kita.
Ta! mipangciwa kita
S.TRANSL: Let's go! Let's go play baseball.

S.FORM: Naay, simamelawen kaku tu cudad.
S.TRANSL: No, I have books to read.

S.FORM: Padangi aca kaku a miala tu saasik.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: Hay! rapeten kina saasik.
Padangi aca kaku a miala tu sasisit.
S.TRANSL: Can you get me a rag, please?

S.FORM: Miasik kaku, papialaen ci Tumay
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask Tumay to help you.

S.FORM: Maherek tu haw kisu a miasik?
Maherek tu kaku a miasik.
Kiya caay saw piasik kisu?
Maherek tu kaku a miasik.
Mauning ku tatarukan, sipuen aca.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Hay, alaay tu nu maku ku sasipu.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: Tanuuning saan kira sasingarang, sipuen aca.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Akahenay, caay henay kaherek ku nipiasik nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: A u maan saw ku demaken nu misu anusani?
A mikilim kaku tu pasevana'ay.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: A mimaan saw kisu i naherekan nu nipicudad?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: A remadiw kami u malecavayay.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: A mimaan saw cira i naherekan nu nipicudad?
A midanguy cira.
I luma' tu haw ci Lisin?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Lisin is home?

S.FORM: I luma' tu cira, picumudi.
S.TRANSL: She's at home, please come in.

S.FORM: I luma' tu haw ci Lisin?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Lisin is home?

S.FORM: Awaay cira, a mimaan saw kisu?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She's not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: Cima saw?
Vaki! Ci Panay kaku, vuhaten aca ku panan.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I'm Panay, please open the door.

S.FORM: Cima saw kisu?
Kacaw, ci Kilang kaku, tayni a mihulul isaw.
S.TRANSL: Kacaw, I'm Kilang, I'm here to play.

S.FORM: Matenes tu a caay kasasuaraw kiyami.
Halis! Maurun tu i tisuwan hani, Kati, picumudi.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let's chat!

S.FORM: Kamaru', pinanumi hen tu ucia.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: Hay, nanumay tu nu maku.
Keda! Pinanumi tu ucia.
S.TRANSL: Come on! Please have some tea.

S.FORM: Ayi! alesu' saan a nanumen kina ucia.
Kati, kemana kita tu ciyak.
Hayi, saalesu' saan a melawen kina ciyak.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!這西瓜看起來很好吃喔。

S.FORM: Alesu' haw kina ciyak?
Hayi! Sulinay alesu' isaw.
Maherek tu ci ina a misakalavi, kati! Kemana tu kita.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，我們快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, let's eat!

S.FORM: Hay, mamanaw hen aca kaku.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: Dupuh han a kemaen, u tau hanay maan kisu.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you're not an outsider.

S.FORM: Adihay tu ku nikaen nu maku, mave:cul tu kaku.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I'm full.

S.FORM: Pitungali a kemaen, u maan saw ku kanguduan.
Hay saw! saalesu' saan.
A taluma' tu kaku, rumaaw tu a tayni a milisu' i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 我要回家了，下次再來看你。
I'm going home, I'll see you next time.

S.FORM: Hayi, naun hantu isaw ku rakat.
I lavii tu! a taluma' tu kaku.
Tayni hantu a mihulul anuruma.
Naun hantu isaw ku rakat.
S.TRANSL: Then take care and go slowly!

S.FORM: Hayi, anu silawad tayni hantu i luma' nu maku a mihulul.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: Initu haw kita! A hakulungen nu maku kamu anini a remiad, tayra kita a milisu' tu matuasay nu niyaru'.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I'm taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: Ayi kapah! A sanuPangcahen nu mita a masasuwal atu matuasay.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說阿美語。

S.FORM: A tangasa tu haw kita?
Hay! A tangasa tu kita.
Vakiaw! Tayni kami a milisu' i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we've come to see you.

S.FORM: Ihu! Mavana' haw kamu a misanuPangcah? Piulah' waru!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說阿美語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: Kapah haw kamu! A hakulungen nu maku kamu a tayra i nipalumaan tu havay a mawmah.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: Hay, pasevana'ay.
Katayni itini a masasilsil, aka kapawan a mikerid tu sakawmah.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: Hay pasevana'ay, iratu ku nirapetan niyam tu sakamaumah.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we've got our tools.

S.FORM: Tangasa tu haw kita?
Caay hen, maraay henay ku rarakatan.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it's still far away.

S.FORM: Kaisu ku mirisrisay tu rengus.
S.TRANSL: You go and pick up the grass.

S.FORM: Hay! Akuay ku mirisrisay tu rengus.
Pialai kisu tu sapivahuy tu ayam.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: Hayi, akuay ku mivahuyay tu ayam.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: Kapah tu haw kita, a tayra kita anini a remiad i mamelawen tu niruvuan a aadupen.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: Sulinay haw? A makamaan saw kita a tayra?
S.TRANSL: 真的嗎?我們要怎麼去呢?
Really? How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: A makavasu kita a tayra.
Sakapahen ku nipisilsil, a micakay tu kita tu paya.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: Hayi!
U ayam ku aayaway, u uner ku lalikulay, kaamu hantu ku mimelaway.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay, matalaw kaku tu uner.
Asiruma, ka u ayam aca ku melawen nu misu.
S.TRANSL: It doesn't matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: Herek nu cacay a tatukian, itini kita a malecapu.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We'll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: Hay, aray pasevana'ay.
Na u maan saw ku nikamelawen nu misu?
Adihay ku nikamelawan nu maku tu uner, adihay aca ku ayam.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: Sakalamkamen, a malingad tu kita.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: Akahenay saw! Matimel ku kuku' nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: Ta! Midanguya haw kita?
Ta isaw! Tata!
Aluman ku midanguyay itini.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: Talulung ku itilaay a nanum, itini hanaw tu nu mita a midanguy.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water there is deep, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: Namakamaan saw kisu a taini?
Rakaten nu maku a taini.
Na u maan saw ku dadakawen nu misu a taini?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: Namakavasu kaku a taini.
Maanen saw nu misu a tala cacudadan?
S.TRANSL: How do you get to school?

S.FORM: Tupinen ni ama kaku.
Makamaan saw cira a tayra i cacudadan tu kaluremiad?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: Maka cie-yun a tayra i cacudadan cira.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: Makamaan saw ci vayi nu misu a micakay tu dateng?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: Makaotovay cira a micakay tu dateng.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: A maanen saw nu misu a tara i Butud?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: A makalunan kaku a tara i Butud.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: A makamaan saw cira a tara i Butud?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: A makahikuki cira a tara i Butud.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: A makamaan saw cira a tara i Kausung?.
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: A maka kau-tie cira a tara i Kausung.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: Na u silamalay haw ku dakawen nira a tara i Pusung?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Hayi! Na u silamalay ku dakawen nira a tara i Pusung.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: Na u silamalay haw ku dakawen nira a tara i Pusung?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Caay isaw, na u hikuki ku dakawen nira a tara i Pusung.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: Sipangiruwan haw nu vasu i ngata?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: Hay, ira tu! vesuc han kina lalan, a mamelaw tu nu misu ku pangiruwan nu vasu.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: Icuwa saw ku sakangataay a cie-yun-can itini?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: Awaay ku cie-yun-can itini, a u takusi a cacay ku dadakawen nu misu.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: Anu makavasu kaku, a hacuwa saw ku tenes a tangasa i cacudadan?
S.TRANSL: 搭公車要多久才會到學校?
How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: Cacay a pulu' ira ku lima a sasuritan tangasatu.
Anu maka kaw-tie, a hacuwa saw ku tenes a tangasa i Taychung?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: Cacay a tatukiyan tangasa tu i Taychung.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: A hacuwa saw ku tenes anu makacidusiya a tara i Ulay?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: Cacay a tatukian kiyaru.
A hacuwa saw ku tenes anu maka cie-yun kisu a tayni i luma' nu maku?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?

S.FORM: Tusa a pulu' a sasuritan tangasatu.
S.TRANSL: It takes 20 minutes to get there.

S.FORM: Mavana' haw kisu a mivatikar?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: Hay! Mavana' kaku a mivatikar.
S.TRANSL: Yes! I can ride a bicycle.

S.FORM: Siotovay haw kisu?
Hay! Siotovay kaku.
Siotovay haw kisu?
Caay kasiotovay kaku.
Mangaay hakiya anu tara kaku a milisu' i tisuwan?
Hay, kapah tu!
Mangaay hakiya anu tara kaku a milisu' i tisuwan?
A caay kaku, caay kaadihay ku nikavana'an nu maku isaw.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: Mangalay isaw kaku a milisu' i tisuwan, silawad hakiya kisu i herek nu kalahukan?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: Hayi! Talaay tu nu maku kisu i luma'.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Silawad haw kisu anucila? Ira isaw ku papalitaan nu maku tu rayray nu Pangcah.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於阿美族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I would like to ask you about the legends of the Amis.

S.FORM: A talalutuk kaku anucila, a awaay i luma' isaw.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: Matesek ku nikavana'an nu misu tu lekakawa nu Pangcah saan ku nikatengil nu maku. Sisa, mangalay isaw kaku a mipalita i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對阿美族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you know a lot about Amis traditions and customs, so I would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: Caay kahacuwa ku nikavana' nu maku, nika, sadakadakay hanaw tu nu maku a pacauv.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: Kapah tu haw a lu-inen nu maku? Hangay maangaay a duduen a misurit i nalikulan.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: Hayi! Kapah tu!
Pinatu saw ku mihcaan nu misu anini?
Siwatu a pulu' ira ku walu ku mihcaan nu maku.
I terungay hen a miheca a melawen ku tireng isu haw.
Icuwa saw! Mavakitu kaku ira!
Icuwaay saw a niyaru' kisu?
S.TRANSL: What tribe do you come from?

S.FORM: U Naturanay kaku.
U Pangcah tu haw ku vavahi nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是阿美族人嗎?

S.FORM: Caay, u Puyuma cira.
U macuwaay saw a sasuwalen ku kavana'an nu misu?
Mavana' kaku a semuwal tu nu Pangcah atu nu Puyuma isaw.
S.TRANSL: 我會說阿美語和卑南語。
I can speak Ami and Puyuma.

S.FORM: Maulah kaku anini a remiad a milisu' i tisuwan, kedamay kasemuwal may tu paysin i nipiadupan namu?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，你們在狩獵時的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboos you have when it comes to hunting?

S.FORM: Hayi, kapah tu! Yu masakapah hen hinatayra kami i lutuk a miadup.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我們年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. We used to go hunting in the mountains when we were young.

S.FORM: Tadamaan ku nipasevana' nu misu itina remiadan, aray han nu maku kisu.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: Nu namaka tuasay sulinayay amin ku nipakungkuan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: Hatilaaw tu ku nikasasuwal nu mita, awaay tu ku sasuwalen tu nipavatis nu misu, aray han nu maku kisu.
S.TRANSL: 我們今天的訪談就到這裡。非常謝謝您的分享。
This is the end of our interview today. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: Aka haeni ku suwal, rumaaw tu kita a masasuwal.
S.TRANSL: 不要這麼說，我們下次再聊。
Don't say that, let's talk about it next time.

S.FORM: Hatilaaw tu ku demak ita, halhalay tu saadihayaw tu ku nipakungku anuruma.
S.TRANSL: 我們工作就到此，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
That's all we've done. We look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: Hayi tu! naun han tu ku rakat.
Ini haw kisu, u maan saw ku cakayen nu misu?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: A micakay kaku tu kupu.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: Ini haw kisu, u maan saw ku cakayen nu misu?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Mangalay kaku a micakay tu tuper.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: A micakay kaku tu kupu, pacakay haw kamu?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: Ira tu! a pina saw ku cacakayan nu misu?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Pacakay haw kamu tu icep?
Awaay! Caay pacakay kami tu icep.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: Mangalay kaku a micakay tu velac.
A pina saw a tavu ku nipicakay nu misu?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Tuluen a tavu ku nipaveli i takuwan.
A micakay kaku tu vunga.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Awaaytu! maemintu a pacakayen ku vunga.
S.TRANSL: 沒有了! 地瓜都賣完了。
No more! All the potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: A micakay kaku tu simal, tusa a sinatuwik.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: Ca:cay tu a sinatuwikan ku usaw.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: Patadui hen isaw kaku a micakay tu litaul.
S.TRANSL: Go buy an egg for me.

S.FORM: A pina saw a daduy ku nipicakay nu misu?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: A pina saw a daduy ku nipicakay nu misu tu litaul?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: A tusa a daduy ku nipicakay nu maku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: A micakay kaku tu kenaw, tusaen a kamel.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: Tulu tu a kamel ku usaw, hamisuen tu amin.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: Pina saw ku aca nina velac?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: Cacay a tavu tusa a patekenan ku aca
Kumud han tusa a pulu' ira ku cacay, tusa a pulu' hanaw tu ku nipisausi.
Ihu'ihu:, kisu!
S.TRANSL: That's very kind of you, thank you!

S.FORM: Siwa a pulu' ira ku lima kinian.
Tungalay nu maku ku nipicakay, edemaw ku cacay a patekenan.
S.TRANSL: 我再加買一點，好湊足100元。
I'll buy some more, so I can make up $100.

S.FORM: Kumud han ku aca, lima a patekenan ira ku muketep.
Masa saw? anu limaen a patekenan ku nipaaca nu maku?
Matekes isaw, masasaw a kelulen atudi ku aca?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以再減一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you reduce it a bit?

S.FORM: A caay isaw, awaay tu ku kakelulen.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經不能再減了。
No, this can't be reduced any further.

S.FORM: Inian a piyangan ku alaan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: I'll take this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: Tulu a pulu' ku aca nina piyang, ira hen haw ku kangalayan?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: Madengay tu haw kisu a pacaliw tu pida i takuwan.
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Hay isaw! A hacuwa saw ku nipicaliw nu misu?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: Mapawan kaku tu papidaan hani, caliway aca ku pida nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，你的錢借我一下好嗎?
I forgot to bring my money, can you lend me your money?

S.FORM: Mahaen kaku, awaay ku nipikerid nu maku tu pida.
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: Mapawan kaku tu papidaan hani, caliway aca ku pida nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢包了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring my wallet, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Aka, caay hen kisu panukas tu nicaliwan i naayaw.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: Pacaliwi kaku tu vuduy isu.
Hayi, keda! Kaisu tu ku mialaay.
Pacaliwen aca kaku tu cudad nu misu.
Pacaliwentu nu maku ci Nakawan.
Pacaliwi kaku tu vatikar nu misu?
Hayi! Nika, a panukasen tu nu misu anucila.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to return it tomorrow.

S.FORM: Uradan tu! caay kasicacevaren kaku, caliway hen aca ku cacevaren nu misu.
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: Ca:cay ku cacevaren nu maku, cacayat hanaw tu nu mita.
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: U nipacaliwan nu misu kina cudad i takuwan inacila, ya! panukasay tu nu maku kisu.
S.TRANSL: 這是你昨天借給我的書，拿著，還給你。
Here's the book you lent me last time, take it and give it back.

S.FORM: Anu ira hen ku mamamelawen a cudad, suwal hantu kaku.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: A hacuwa saw kaku a panukas i tisuwan tu nicaliwan a pida?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: Asiruma, anu sipida kisu itiya han tu a panukas.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It's okay, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: A hacuwa saw kisu a panukas tu nicaliwan a pida i takuwan?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: Cilaaw tu nu maku a panukas i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: I will return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: A hacuwa tu saw kisu a panukas tu nicaliwan a cudad i takuwan?
S.TRANSL: 你(到底)什麼時候要還我書啊?
When are you (exactly) going to return my book?

S.FORM: Napanukasentu nu maku kisu inacila kiyami.
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: Nipacaliwan haw ni Kacaw kina sapisurit i tisuwan?
S.TRANSL: Did Kacaw lend you this pen?

S.FORM: Hayi! Nicaliwan nu maku i ciraan anini a remiadan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: Nicaliwan haw nu misu ci Kacawan kina sapisurit?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Kacaw?

S.FORM: Caay, u nicakayan ni ina aku.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: Awaaytu ku cilah, caliwen ku cilah na Panay.
S.TRANSL: We're out of salt, go borrow some from Panay.

S.FORM: Hayi, caliway tu nu maku.
Papinukasen ci Panay tu nicaliwan nira a pida i takuwan.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Panay to pay me back.

S.FORM: Pina saw ku nitadahan nira tu pida i tisuwan?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: A talacuwa saw kisu?
A tayra padatengan kaku a paluma tu dateng.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: Mimaan saw kisu?
Tanurengus saan, mivirsiw kaku tu rengus, a pananum aca anusani.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下還要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting the grass, I have to water it later.

S.FORM: Padangen aca kaku a miala tu kakawit atu tatak?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: Icuwaen saw nu misu a pateli?
I tapiingan nu tavi ku nipateli.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: Natavien tu haw nu misu.
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: Maheka nitavien nu maku, a paluma tu anusani.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: Dengay tu haw a datengen ku nipalumaan nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: Dengay tu a datengen ku itiniay a tamana, iraayay a mauway a caay hen ka u dadatengan.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: Huvaw! Kiya hatila tu saw ku nivungaan nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: Singaen kina vunga i alili?
S.TRANSL: 把這些番薯存放在穀倉好嗎?
Can you store the sweet potatoes in the barn?

S.FORM: Mimaan saw kamu?
Mitavukud kami a mivuting
S.TRANSL: We were throwing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: Adihay haw ku vuting itini?
Adihaytu ku nitavukudan niyam i vuvu.
S.TRANSL: 我們魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
We've been catching a lot of fish in the fish traps.

S.FORM: Maanen saw namu a mivuting i kaluremiadan?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: Tavukuden nu maku ku nipivuting.
S.TRANSL: I use a gossip net to catch fish.

S.FORM: Pana'en haw nu misu ku nipiadup?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: U veteric a tekeran ku sapiadup nu maku, yu ruma sikuwang pasuwacu a miadup.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: U rarakatan nu vavuy nu lutuk kina lalan.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: Kiya mavana' saw kisu?
Nu vavuy a narakatan kinian, manay, u rarakatan nu vavuy nu lutuk kina lalan isaw.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: Kalamkamaw nu mita a milidu' tu nipatekeran, mahaen simalepelay nu tama'.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: Kiya mavana' saw kisu?
Mahiphip tu nu wacu ku silet nu vavuy, sakalamkamaw nu mita a mikuku.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快追隨跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's go after them.

S.FORM: U maan saw ku sanga'en nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: Misaerid kaku tu sapiteker tu tuluk.
S.TRANSL: 我在做套索陷阱，用來捕抓雉雞的。
I'm making lasso traps to catch pheasants.

S.FORM: U maan saw kira nipateliyan nu misu itila?.
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: U sasekerut a teker kiraan, u sapilepel tu mancel.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: Mapalemed kita nu kawas, adihay ku tama' nu mita i anini a remiad.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: Hayi o! anu tangasa tu i luma' iri, pavavatis hanaw tu ku cavacavay.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們回到家後就好好地分享給親朋好友吧!
Yes! Let's share it with our friends and family when we get home!

S.FORM: Anini a remiad a pasevana' kaku i tamuwan, a maan han a semuwal ku mananuwangay a ma'uripay tu suwal nu Pangcah.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的阿美語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Pangcah language today.

S.FORM: Anini a remiad a pasevana' kaku i tamuwan, a maan han a semuwal ku lemangaway tu suwal nu Pangcah.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的阿美語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of plants in Pangcah language today.

S.FORM: Anini a remiad a pasevana' kaku i tamuwan, a maan han a semuwal ku nipalumaan a heci tu suwal nu Pangcah.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的阿美語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Pangcah language today.

S.FORM: Aka kavuti'.
Aka kasemuwal.
Aka kakemaen.
Patahekalen ku cudad nu misu.
Patahekalen ku sapisurit nu misu.
Patahekalen ku sasasuritan nu misu.
Singa'en tu ku cudad.
Singa'en ku sapisurit.
Singa'en tu ku kakaenan.
Singa'en tu ku sasalamaan.
U nima saw kina sapisurit?
U nu maku.
U nima saw kina cudad?
U ni Kacaw
U nima saw kina savuric?
Caay kavana' kaku.
U ni Kacaw haw kira vuduy?
Caay, u ni Panay a pakitupen kinian.
Pasevana'ay, mapawan kaku a mikerid tu cudad nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn't bring my textbook.

S.FORM: Kahekulung atu i teparay a mimelaw tu cudad.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: Mapitek ku sapisurit nu miku.
Picaliwi tu nu kaput.
Ka u yencepi ku sapisurit.
Masiday ku savuric nu maku.
Pacaliway nu maku kisu tu savuric nu maku.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: A pahanhan tu kita namicudad, piarawi tu rakat a taluma'!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: Hay, aray pasevana'ay.
A pahanhan tu kita namicudad, ulihaw kamu!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見！
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: Ulihaw pasevana'ay.
Initu haw kita, ci Using ku ngagan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Using.

S.FORM: Kapah haw kisu Using!
Initu haw kita, ci Kumud ku ngangan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Kumud.

S.FORM: Kapah haw kisu Kumud.
Kapah haw kisu, ci Putal kaku.
Kapah haw kisu Putal, ci Vuting kaku.
Kapah haw kisu, ci Adup kaku.
Kapah haw kisu, ci Lais kaku.
Cima saw kisu?
Ci ina ni Valah kaku, ci Lisin kaku.
Cima saw kisu?
U sava ni Valah kaku, ci Vahi ku ngangan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 我是Balah的妹妹，我的名字是Vahi。
I am Balah's sister. My name is Vahi.

S.FORM: Cima saw cira?
U pasevana'ay nu maku cira, ci Valiyus ku ngangan nira.
Cima saw kira tamdaw?
U kaka nu maku cira, ci Kilang ku ngangan nira.

Ci Kumud kaku.

S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister's name?

S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister's name?

Ci Iyung ku ngangan nira.
Pinaay tu saw ku mihecaan nu kaka nu misu?

Pina tu saw ku mihecaan nu sava nu misu?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

Sicacudadan haw ku niyaru' namu?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: Iratu.
I niyaru'ay haw a cacudadan a micudad kisu?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe's school?

S.FORM: Hay, matiyatu u laluma'an kami a micudad i cacudadan.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: Cima saw kira vavainay?

U kaka tu vavahian nu maku cira.

S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

U mimaanay saw ku demak ni ama nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: U pasevana'ay cira.
U sava haw nu misu cira?
Caay, u cavay nu sava tu vavainayan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother's friend.

S.FORM: U kaka tu vavahian haw nu misu cira?
Caay, u sava tu vavahian nu maku cira.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: Papina saw ku tamdaw nu luma' nu heni?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: Lalima ku tamdaw nu luma' nu heni.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: Papina saw ku wawa nu luma' namu?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: Papina saw ku sava nu misu?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Awaay ku sava nu maku tu vavainayan, tatulu ku sava tu vavahian.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don't have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: Papina saw ku kaka nu misu?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Awaay ku kaka aku.
S.TRANSL: I don't have any older siblings.

S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

U malekakaay haw kamu?
Hay, u kaka nu maku cira.
U Yincumin haw kamu?
Hay, u Yincumin kami.
U Pangcah haw cira?
Hay, u Pangcah cira.

Sienaw ku remiad, pinanumi tu vaedetay a nanum.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It's a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: Mamaan saw ku remiad anini?
Caledes ku remiad, adihayen ku nipinanum.
S.TRANSL: It's a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Mamaan saw ku remiad i hekal?
Tataang ku cidal, kasitupertu.
S.TRANSL: 太陽很大，要記得戴帽子。
The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: Mamaan saw ku remiad i hekal?
Sikutemtu, awaay a mamelaw ku cidal.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: A mamaan hakiya ku remiad anucila?
Awaay ku cidal, sikutem, tataang ku vali anucila.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: Namamaan saw ku remiad itiya a remiadan?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: Sienaw itiya a remiad, kasiparaktu tu a tahekal.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: A mamaan hakiya ku remiad itiya i pahanhanan?
S.TRANSL: How's the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: Cahedalan ku remiad i pahanhanan.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: A uradan hakiya itiya a remiadan?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Cahedalan ku remiad itiya a remiad, caay kauradan.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: A uradan hakiya itiya a remiadan?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Hay, a maurad i tiya a remiad.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: Mauraday hen haw anini?
Masatereptu ku urad, masadak tu ku cidal.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: Maurad hen haw anini?
Mauradaytu, caay kasicacevaren kaku.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don't have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: Maurad haw i hekal?
Caay tu kauradan anini, a maurad i herek nu lahuk, kasicacevaren tu a tahekal.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: A sienaway hakiya ku kasienawan nu anucila a mihcaan?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: Hay, a sienaaw i kasienawan nu anucila a mihecaan, tungalentu ku nikasivuduy.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: A caledes haw i kalaludan nu anini a mihecaan?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: Hay, a caledes i kalaludan, adihayen ku nipinanum.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Maulah haw kisu tu kacanglahan?
Hay, maulah kaku tu kacanglahan, dihekuway ku remiad.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: Maulah haw kisu tu kasariwsiwan?
Caay kaulah kaku tu kasariwsiwan, adihay ku valiyus i kasariwsiwan.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don't like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: Mapawan kaku a sicudad.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: Tatusa han nu mita a mimelaw.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: Mapawan kaku a sisavuric.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: Pacaliway nu maku kisu.
Mapawan haw kisu a mikerid tu sisapisurit?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: Hay, pacaliwi isaw kaku tu sapisurit nu misu?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: A u maan saw ku sakalahuk nu misu?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: U minpaw ku nu maku.
A u maan saw ku sakalavi nu misu?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: U hemay ku nu maku.
Na u maan saw ku sakaranam nu misu?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: Na u litaul ku nikaen nu maku.
Na u maan saw ku sakalahuk nu misu?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: Na u titi nu ayam ku nikaen nu maku.
Ta! miparukud kita tu mali.
Ka isu ku ayaw, kilim hanaw tu aku kisu anusawni.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: Ta! midanguy kita.
Ta! mahekulunga kita a tayra.
Ta! mimali kita.
Naay, ka u cudad ku ayawen nu mita a miculu'.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: Namisulac tu haw kisu tu wadis?
Caay hen, misuvaway hen kaku tu kaysing.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: Namiluwalu' tu haw kisu?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: Hay, namiluwalu' tu kaku.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: Namisuvaw tu haw kisu tu kaysing?
Namisuvawtu kaku tu kaysing.
Kiya caay saw kamamanaw tu kamay kisu?
S.TRANSL: Why didn't you wash your hands?

S.FORM: Sawni tu kaku a mamanaw.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: Namimaan saw kisu inasani?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: Namikilim kaku tu pasevana'ay.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: A mimaan saw kisu i herek namicudad?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: A kakerur satu kaku a taluma'.
A mimaan saw cira i herek namicudad?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: A misakeru cira.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Aniwaw, i luma' tu haw kisu?
Hay, initu picumudi.
Aniwaw, i luma' tu haw kisu?
Awaay i luma' ci Aniw, ci Lipay kaku. A mimaan saw? Sasuwal hanaw tu aku ci Aniw anu taluma'.
S.TRANSL: Aniw不在家耶!我是Lipay，有什麼事嗎?回來我會轉告Aniw。
Aniw is not at home. I am Lipay. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: Cima saw kamu?
Vayiaw, ci Tipus aci Aniw kami, padangi kami a mivuhat tu panan!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Tipus和Aniw，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Tipus and Aniw, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: Cima saw kamu hani?
Ci Puyar kaku, tayniyay kaku a mikilim ci Laisan.
S.TRANSL: I am Puyar, I am here for Lais.

S.FORM: Vayiaw, tayniyay kaku a milisu' i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: Matenestu a caay katayni kisu, maurun tu aca kaku i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven't been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Aniw, initu kaku.
S.TRANSL: Aniw, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: Picumudi, mitalaaytu kaku i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: Tanamen may! u nipaluma nu maku a vunga kiniyan.
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: Cuperas kina vunga.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: Kati! kaenen saw! U nipalumaan nu maku a lusay kiniyan.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: Sicedam kina lusay.
Kamaru' ! Kaenen saw! U nipalumaan nu maku a taviras kiniyan.
S.TRANSL: 請坐!這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: Emm ! U ruma ku sicedam nina taviras haw.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: Mangalay haw kisu a kemaen tu kama?
A caay hen kaku kakemaen tu kama, ka u linko hanaw.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can't eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: Mangalay haw kisu a kemaen tu piyang?
Hay, u kaulahan aku.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: Puhci'ay hen nu kaku ku lusay tu sapakaen i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: Ay haw! Tanusalang saan kina lusay.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: Panamumay nu maku kisu.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: Aray.
Saadihayen ku nikaen, adihay ku nicacakan nu maku tu sinavel.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: Ay! Savangsis saan, saalesu' aca a kaenen.
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: Dupuhi a kemaen, adihay hen itini.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: A caay kangudu kaku yu!
S.TRANSL: I'll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: Dupuhi a kemaen, adihay hen itini.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: Adihaytu ku nikaen nu maku, hamanan tu.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn't eat any more.

S.FORM: A hakulungen nu pasevana'ay kamu a talalutuk i anini a remiad.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Tanulikes saan i lutuk sa ci ina.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: A hakulungen nu pasevana'ay kamu a talaumah i anini a remiad.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: A tayra haw kita a mikali tu sera?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: A talacuwa saw kita anini?
A hakulungen nu pasevana'ay kita a tayra tarawadaw.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: A talacuwa saw kita anini?
A hakulungen nu pasevana'ay kita a talalutuk.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: A tayra haw kita i tarawadaw?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: Caay, a keriden kita nu pasevana'ay a talalutuk.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: A talalutuk haw kita anini?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: Caay, a talaumah kita anini.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay, a u maan saw ku mamelawen nu mita i tarawadaw?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: A tayra kita a mimelaw tu veded.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay, a u maan saw ku mamelawen nu mita a talalutuk?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: A tayra kita a mimelaw tu adipapang.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: A mimaan saw kita a talaumah?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: A talauamh a mimelaw kita tu nipalumaan a taviras, arawi haw! silalunah, sikaketi yu!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay, a tayra haw kita i sauwac a midanguy?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: Caay, a tayra kita mimelaw tu veded.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay, a talaumah haw kita a paluma tu dateng?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: A tayra kami mikali tu sera.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: Misavahevaher ku veded itila.
Anini hen kaku a makamelaw tu mauripay a veded.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: Misavahevaher ku adipapang itila.
Huvaw! ay! Maulah kaku tu adipapang, savangcal saan.
S.TRANSL: 耶!哇!我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: Misavahevaher ku adipapang itila.
Caay, ka u adipapang kiraan, u udal kiraan.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: Kaitini tu a misamelamelaw, aka katayra i raay yu!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don't go too far!

S.FORM: Hay, a caay katayra i raay kami.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won't go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: Aka kavekac, naunen ku rakat, matulu'a.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don't run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: Makalah kaku a makamelaw.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: Makamaan saw kisu a tara i taluan?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: Makakarireng kaku a tara i taluan.
Makamaan saw cira a tara i paisingan?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: Rakaten nira a tara i paisingan.
Makamaan saw kisu a tara i Peng-hu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Makahikuki kaku a tara i Peng-hu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: Makamaan saw kisu a tara i Peng-hu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Makalunan kaku a tara i Peng-hu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: Makamaan saw kisu a taluma'?
Makaciyeyun kaku a taluma'.
Makamaan saw ci Panay a tara i cacudadan?
S.TRANSL: How does Panay go to school?

S.FORM: Makasilamalay a talacudadan ci Panay.
S.TRANSL: Panay goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Makamaan saw ci Kacaw a tara i kyokay?
S.TRANSL: How does Kacaw go to church?

S.FORM: Makavatikar ci Kacaw a tala kyokay.
S.TRANSL: Kacaw goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: Makaciyeyun haw kisu a micudad?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: Caay, makavasu kaku a micudad.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: Makatikar haw kisu a micudad?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: Hay, makavatikar kaku a micudad.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: Makakawtye haw kisu a tara Takao?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: Hay, makakawtye kaku a tala Takao.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: U silamalay haw anusa makahikuki kisu a tara Taytung?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: Makahikuki kaku, ki'ayawen nu hikuki ku silamalay.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: A makavasu haw kisu a tala kiyokay anusa a parakat tu karireng kisu?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: A parakat kaku tu karireng a tala kyokay, mangalav ku nikacaluwayan a makavasu.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: Hacuwa saw ku nikararaay nu patiyamay atu luma' namu?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: Caay kangata isaw, makaotovay tu kaku a tara i patiyamay.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: Mangangata haw ku yuving atu cacudadan?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: Mangata, rakat han a tangasatu.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: Mangangata haw ku kakaenan atu pangiruan?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: I kaepudan a pangiruan, pasatimulen ku rakat, lima a sasuritan hakiya ku nirakatan tangsa tu ku kakatayraan.
S.TRANSL: 出車站往南走,再走五分鐘目的地了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: Silawad haw kisu anini?
A mimaan saw?
Mangalay kaku a tayra a milisu' i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: Sidemak hen kaku awaay i luma', lica hanawtu!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家，改天吧!
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: Silawaday hakiya kisu anucila? I herek nu lahuk a tayra isaw kaku.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎? 我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I'll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: Kapah tu! hay, i luma' kaku a mitala i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Kapah tu haw a miluinen nu maku? Hangay mangaay a suriten nu maku isaw.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: Hay, kapah tu isaw.
Kapah tu haw a miluing?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Caay kasalungan a melawen kaku, caay hen aca pilisimet tu alili, hamanan anini.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦！
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn't been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: Ka u nipisiyasing hanaw nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: Hamanan ku nipisiyasing.
Aray han nu maku kisu tu nipapilisu' a mipalita i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Aymaan saw! A u maan ku papalitaan nu misu?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: Yu masakapah hen kisu, na u maan saw ku demaken?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: Namalakincalay kaku i naayaw, nika misawad tu kaku anini.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: Dademak hen haw kisu anini?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: Mikuli kaku i cacudadan anini.
I niyaru' haw a maru' ku wawa nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Caay, i tokay ku aru' nu wawa nu maku isaw.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: Isu tu a cacay haw ku maru'ay itini?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Iratu ku nipahavay nu maku tu wacu atu ayam, u tamadaway tu nu luma' nu maku ku heni isaw.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Ira ku nipahavayan nu maku tu nani, ira ku pacavayay, caay tu kasacacay isaw.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won't get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Ira ku papalitaan nu kaku tu paysin tu nu sakay piadupan.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Caay kahacuwa ku nikavana'an nu maku, iraan hanaw tu u nikavana'an nu maku ku sapacauv i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don't know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Sipaysin haw kamu tu sapiadup a sarepet?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Caay pisulul kami a tevingen nu vavahi ku sapiadup a rarepetan.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: Kapah tu haw a papihakulungen ku vavahi a miadup?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: Akaa, raecus ku vavahi a miadup.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Kacaw, picakayi tu viciw, awaay tu ku viciw nu luma'.
S.TRANSL: Kacaw，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Kacaw, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Hamanan picakay! Siusaw hen tu cacay a sinatuwikan i aniva.
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: Caay kadengay ku cacay a sinatuwik, tusaen aca ku nipicakay.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: A micakay kaku tu viciw, sinipacakay haw namu?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: Iratu isaw! A pinaen saw ku nipicakay nu misu?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Tusaen, a micakay aca kaku tu cacay a tavu nu velac.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Ini ku velac, sicacakayen hen haw kisu?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: A micakay aca kaku tu litaul, sinipacakay haw kamu?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: Awaay tu ku papacakayen tu litaul niyam.
A micakay kaku tu vuduy.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: U mamaanay saw ku kangalayan nu misu?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: U mapusutay a ledung ku cakayen nu maku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: Mamaan saw kira lahngangay a vuduyan?
Sirumaan haw a cengel?
Siusaw hen kami tu vuhcalay atu karacingay.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Pavelien kaku tira karacingay a vuduy.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Kacaw, natalacuwaay saw kisu inasawni? Milaylayay haw kisu tu tireng?
S.TRANSL: kacaw你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Kacaw, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Caay, namipadang kaku a pacakay tu dateng ni vayi.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: Namahaen haw! silawad haw kisu tu lavii' ? mamaan saw a mahkulung kita a malavi ?
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊！你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Awaay ku lawad, a tayra kaku a micakay tu vuduy.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Mahekulung kita a tayra.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Kapah haw kisu, pinaan saw kina dateng?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: Cacay a kamel tusa a pulu' ku aca.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: Pinaan saw kina vunga?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: Cacay a daduy nu vunga tulu a pulu' ku aca.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Pavelien kaku tu tusa a kamel nu dateng atu cacay a daduyan nu vunga.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Kacawaw, mapawan kaku a mikerid tu sapisurit, kapah haw kisu a pacaliw i takuwan?
S.TRANSL: Kacaw，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Kacaw, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Mahaen kaku, u ni Panay kiniyan.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either. This is Panay's.

S.FORM: Pacaliwi hen aca kaku? Sani a panukasen tu nu maku kisu.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: Hay, alaen.
Aray, aray han tu ci Panay.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Panay for me.

S.FORM: U maan saw ku kangalayan nu misu?
A panukas kaku tina tusaay a cudad.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: Hay, ira hen haw ku kangalayen?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: A micaliw aca kaku tina tuluay a cudad.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Haenentu! aka kapawan a panukas itiya i sakatulu a remiadan.
S.TRANSL: 好了!記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Caay hen panukas kisu tu savuric nu maku.
S.TRANSL: You haven't returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: Napanukasen tu nu maku inacila.
Icuwa tu aca saw ku savuric maku?
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: Nacaay haw pacaliwi nu misu i ci Kacawan?
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Kacaw?

S.FORM: Nakenu! Palitaaw may nu maku cira.
S.TRANSL: I don't know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: Pacaliway aca nu maku ku savuric i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Panay, u nipacaliwan haw nu misu kina paraketu i ci Kacawan?
S.TRANSL: Panay, did Kacaw lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Caay, u nicakayan ni ina aku tu hamakuan.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: U malecaday ku paraketu ni Kacaw atu nu misu.
S.TRANSL: Kacaw's coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: U muhetingay ku paraketu nira, caay kalecad ku kulit niyam.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Panay, namicaliw haw kisu tu pida i ci Kacawan?
S.TRANSL: Panay, did you borrow money from Kacaw?

S.FORM: Hay, ka u panukas isaw kaku anini, nika, mapawan kaku a mikerid tu pida.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，結果,我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: A hacuwatu tu saw kisu a panukas?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: Panukas han tu aku anucila.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: Hay, akuay tu ku semuwalay i ci Kacawan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Kacaw for you.

S.FORM: A u taerev ku sapitama' tu kalavaw, a u erid ku sapiteker tu tikulac, kiya u marucekay isaw.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Araw mahaen haw, muraraw kaku hani, araci' awaay ku nilepel nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that's why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay tu nu maku kisu, anu maanen ku nipisanga' tiya tusaan a tatekeran.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: Ayi! Piulah waru! Anu mahaen a awaay aca haw ku nilepelan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Tarakawtu ku rengus nu umah, pialai tu kakawit i alili, tayra kita i umah.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去庫房拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let's go to the fields.

S.FORM: Icuwa tu saw kira nipatelian a kakawit?
I tapiingan nu vasulan, cumud han nu misu i alili, mamelaw tu.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Pisinanuti a miala, matavala, matalem ku kakawit.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don't get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Aka piripa' tu nipatekeran nu maku.
Icuwa saw ku mipatekeran nu misu?
Itila i sasa nira kilangan ku nipateker nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Kiya makaraheteng hen saw kisu?
Iratu ku nipatektek tu mamelawen, kiya mavana' tu kaku i sacuwaan ku nipaeridan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: U vuvu kinian, i lilis nu sauwac ku nipateli niyam a mivuting.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Awaay ku nipavuvu niyam itila, u nipacemut ku sapivuting niyam.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don't have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Nacaay hen pacemut kaku, paseva'en kaku anuruma?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: Hayi! Mahelukunga kita a pacemut tu vuting i rumaan a remiad.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let's go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay tu nu maku kisu a misanga' tu vuvu anuruma.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Mananuwang tu ku sapacemut nu misu, simikaenay tu haw nu vuting? suluten tu anini.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!現在要拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn't the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Akahenay, pihaceng ku nikalinalin nu lunan. Itini kaku a misulut tu sapacemut, kaira kisu a mipadang a patudud tu cadiway i takuwan.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Pasaynien ku nipisulut tu vuting i takuwan, padangay nu maku kisu a misulut.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up

S.FORM: Huvaw! Masevek ku nipivutingan anini a remiad, matuemes tu ku vuvu ita.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Sakalamkamaw nu mita a taluma', pavatisay tu ku alumanay.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let's go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Aka tu pisalama, Kalamkamen a maru' i aaru'an.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: A maanen aca, mautangtu kaku!
Kalamkamen a micumud.
Sakapina tu a remiad namilipay?
Sakalima a remiad namilipay anini, a pahanhan tu anucila, mahkulunga kita a talamihulul!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It's Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let's go out and play together!

S.FORM: Hayi! a talasauwac kita.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let's go to the riverside.

S.FORM: Sakapina tu a remiad namilipay anucila?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Sakatulu a remiad namilipay anucila, a mimali kami anucila i herek nu lahuk!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let's go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: A mimaan saw kisu anucila a davak?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: U pilipayan anucila, a talakiyukay kaku aci ina aku.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我和媽媽要去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: Mamaan saw kisu?
A muta kaku, a talatatayi'an kaku.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Sinawal kaku.
Kavuti' hen kisu a pahanhan.
Pasevana'ay, adada ku tiya nu maku, a talatatayi'an kaku.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Hayi, kalamkamen a tayla.
Mangaay haw kaku a talamisuvaw tu kamay aku?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: A pahanhantu namicudad, a tatayra aca anusani.
S.TRANSL: It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay, adada ku tangal nu maku, a pahanhan kaku i herek nu lahuk.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
Teacher, I have a severe headache. I need to take a sick leave in the afternoon.

S.FORM: Hayi, piarawi tu haw anu taluma'.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Pasevana'ay a pahanhan kaku i sakacacay namilipay a remiad, a paising kaku.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: Hayi, sakapah han tu ku tireng.
Icuwa saw ci Panay?
Adadaay ku tiyad nira, i tatayi'an cira.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She's in the restroom.

S.FORM: Icuwa saw ci Kacaw?
Pasevana'ay, adadaay ku takulaw ni Kacaw, a pahanhan cira anini.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Kacaw has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: Kiya awaay tayni ci Panay?
Vaedetay ku tireng nira.
Kasemuwal may tu urip nu misu.
Ci Kumud ku ngangan nu maku, muktep ku mihecaan nu kaku anini.
S.TRANSL: My name is Noami Kumud, and I'm 10 years old.

S.FORM: Cima ku ngangan nu misu?
Ci Kumud Luuh ku ngangan nu maku.
U maanan a vinacadan nu wawa kisu?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: U wawa nu Pangcah kaku.
U Yincumin amin haw ku lalavu nu luma' nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Hayi, u Pangcah amin ku lalavu nu luma' nu niyam.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是阿美族人。
Yes, my whole family is Amis.

S.FORM: U Yincumin amin haw ku lalavu nu luma' nu misu?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Caay, u Pangcah ci ama aku, u Hulam ku ina nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是阿美族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Amis, and my mother is Han Chinese.

S.FORM: U nima saw a wawa kisu?
U wawa ni Mayaw Lahuk kaku.
U wama isu haw kiraan? Pina tu ku mihcaan nira?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Enem a pulu' tu ku mihcaan nira.
U wama isu haw kiraan? Pina tu ku mihcaan nira?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Caay, u kalas nu niyaru' nu niyam cira, walu a pulu' tu ku mihcaan nira.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: Pina tu ku mihcaan ni kaka nu misu?
Savaw tu walu tu ku mihcaan ni kaka nu maku.
Hacuwa saw ku pikikaka nu kaka isu itisuwan?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大幾歲嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: Lima a mihcaan ku laed nu niyam.
Hacuwa ku tarakaw nu misu?
Caay a patekenan ira ku sepat a pulu' a kong-fen kaku.
Matenes tu kita caay kasasuaraw, mavatacay tu kisu?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven't seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: Hayi, cacay a patekenan ira ku tulu a pulu' a kong-fen kaku.
Masusuay tu kisu haw?
Icuwa saw, patelacay ku nipimelaw nu misu.
Maku:pit tu kisu?
Icuwa saw, masusu tu kaku.
Masusu: tu kisu?
Hayi, tulu a pulu' a kong-cin kaku anini.
A talacuwa kisu?
A tayra kaku i pangkongse a mikilim tu pasevana'ay.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: A talacuwa ci Kacaw?
A tayra mivalah tu tatuni' cira.
S.TRANSL: He's going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Icuwa saw ci Kacaw?
I dadanguyan cira, a madademec a midanguy cira anusani.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He's at the swimming pool. He's going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Icuwa saw ci Panay? a mamacavi' a mavekac cira anusani.
S.TRANSL: Panay在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Panay? She's going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Ira i li-tang cira, angangen aku cira.
S.TRANSL: She's in the auditorium. I'll go call her.

S.FORM: Ta Mahkulanga kita a tayra i vavekacan!
S.TRANSL: Let's go to the playground together.

S.FORM: A tayra hen kaku a micakay tu sakalahuk, kilim han tu nu maku kisu anusani.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I'll go buy lunch first, and then I'll meet you later.

S.FORM: Ta Mahkulunga kita a mivawa tu tavu!
S.TRANSL: Let's carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Pikilimi tu tau, a tayra hen kaku a mikilim tu pasevana'ay.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I'm going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Kacaw, a madademec tu yakiw haw anini?
S.TRANSL: Is Kacaw competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: Caay, a madadec a mihatevu cira.
S.TRANSL: No, he's competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Yu piundukayan a ira kisu haw a madademec?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天,你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Hayi, a macacavi' a mavekac kaku.
Yu piundukayan a ira kisu haw a madademec?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Ira kaku a madademec tu cuy-ciw.
Yu piundukayan a mimaan saw kita itiya a remiad?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: Madademec kita a mamaviyanga.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: I piundukayan a pacakay haw kita tu kakenen?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Caay, a u mali ku sapacakay nu mita.
Ay! u saayaway kisu!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶！真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You're amazing!

S.FORM: Aray!
I luma' tu haw ci vayi?
Ira tu, mavuti'ay cira i kakavutian.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she's sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: I luma' tu haw ci vayi?
Awaay, makatahkal cira, u lavii tu a taluma'.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she's not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: I luma' tu haw ci vaki?
Ira tu cira i sakatusa a tatungruhan, katakudul isaw!
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧!
He's upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Ira haw ku i luma'ay?
Ci Kacaw haw, matenes tu a caay pakamelaw itisuwan, mamaan tu saw kisu?
S.TRANSL: 是Kacaw啊，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It's Kacaw. I haven't seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: Kapah tu isaw! u tayniayay kaku a masasuwasuwal itisuwan.
S.TRANSL: I'm doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: Icuwa ci ama isu?
Ira i aniva cira a misacacak, angangen aku cira.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He's in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: Talacuwa saw ci Panay?
Tayra i paruvuan cira a mireper tu ayam.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Vaki, initu kami.
Awaay i luma' ci vaki namu, ira i umah cira, ka i luma' han tu a mitala tu nikataluma' nira.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He's in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: Amaaw, ini tu haw kisu!
Matenes tu a caay pakamelaw, mavatacay tu kisu.
S.TRANSL: I haven't seen you in a while. You've grown taller.

S.FORM: Lipahak ku valucu' tu nikatayni nu misu.
S.TRANSL: It's so good to see you.

S.FORM: U sapaveli itamuwan kina paringad, pateli han tu i pinsiyang.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here's a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: Matenesay tu a caay katayni, angangngaw nu maku ku heni a makumud kita a malavi.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃晚餐。
It's been a while. Let's have a meal together.

S.FORM: Hamanan aca, kaw ociya han tu, ini tu kita i palavangan a masasuwasuwal.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I'll just have tea. Let's sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: A taluma' tu kaku haw, aray.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Makahnipacukan kina ayam, u sapataluma' nu misu kiniyan.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: A malalitemuh haw kita anucila i herek nu lahuk?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: Hayi, icuwa saw kita a malalitemuh?
Idengay haw kita i cacudadan a malalitemuh? A miluing kita.
S.TRANSL: 我們約在學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: Kanca tayra i taluan kita, a silusid tu kaku.
S.TRANSL: 那我們去聚會所好了，我也會穿族服去.
Then let's go to the community center. I'll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Savangcal saan a macerak ku sakula i niyaru' niyam. I kacerakan nu varu iri, tayni han tu haw!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: Tala han tu tu nikacanglahan, a mautang tu!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It's too late, isn't it?

S.FORM: I tiya han tu i nikalalikidan a tayni isaw!
S.TRANSL: 那你【豐年祭】的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!

S.FORM: Hayi, tala han tu nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I'm looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Kiya mangalay kisu a taluma' i niyaru'?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: A taluma' kaku itila a pasevana' tu micudaday.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: Kiya caay ka itila i tukay a pasevana' tu micudaday?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Maurun tu kaku tu tadaniyaru' nu maku, mangalay kaku a pananukas tu niyaru'.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: U mavana':ay kisu a mitenun, nacima saw ku pasevana'ay itisuwan?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You're very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Ci vayi nu maku, u savana'ay a mitenun nu niyaru' cira.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Kiya mangalay kisu a minanam a mitenun?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: U nu mita a serangawan ku mitenun hananay, hangay, madutuc tu ku serangawan nu mita sa kaku.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Alesu' kina epah.
U nisaepahan nu maku.
U mavana'ay kisu haw! A matenes haw a misaepah?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害啊!這要釀很久嗎?
You're really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Caay tu, cacay a lalipayan, kiya madengaay tu. A u panay atu velac ku sapisahemay, tiya palamlam han tu tu tamud a mikiwakiw, ta, pinaru han tu i kureng.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: U maan saw ku pacakayen nu misu?
Ira ku cupel, lukiw, u nipalumaan nu maku amin!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Pinaay saw ku aca nu tusaay a nipicakay?
Tusa a patekenan ira ku lima a pulu' ku aca amin.
Maulah kaku tina vuduyan, pinaan saw ku aca?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: Lima a patekenan ku aca nu niyan.
Tadamatekes, serepen atudi ku aca isaw?
S.TRANSL: It's too expensive. Can't you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: Akaa, anu serepen aca ku aca a masipun kaku.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I'll lose money.

S.FORM: Hayi ! kaw iraan aca u muhtingay a vuduy ku kangalayan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I'll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: A micakay kaku tina hawan atu sisuy.
S.TRANSL: 我要買這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Tusa a malevut ku aca amin, u nakamayan nu maku kinian, a matenes a ca:ay kapeci'.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It's a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Pasevana' han tu nu maku ku cavay a itini micakay, serepen aca haw ku aca?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I'll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Hayi, a ira tu ku niserep tu aca itisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I will give you a discount.

S.FORM: Katayni itini haw! ira ku nipacakayan tu vuduy, teper.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Pinaan saw ku aca nina vuduy?
Tulu a patekenan ira ku lima a pulu' ku aca nu vuduy tu cacay, cacay a malevut ku aca nu vaduy tu tulu.
S.TRANSL: 衣服一件350元，衣服三件1000元。
One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Cacayen aca, ka u vaeluhay ku nipaveli itakuwan.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I'll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Matatar, mangalay kaku a micakay tu hakhak atu nisengeran tu tawyu a titi.
S.TRANSL: 早安，我想要買糯米飯和滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: Maminay tu ku hemay. Ira hen ku nipalamlam tu tana' a cung-yu-pin, mangalay haw kisu?.
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Hayi, cacayen ku nu maku, licaaw tu a tayni aca kaku micakay tu hemay.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I'll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Hayi, tavuay tu nu maku, lima a pulu' ku aca nu niyan.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I'll pack it in a bag for you. That'll be 50 dollars.
